trans-unit.source: Provides a string that describes an application settings property group.
trans-unit.target: 提供描述應用程式設定屬性群組的字串。

trans-unit.source: An application settings class, derived from <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase>, defines one or more properties that belong to the same application property group.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式設定類別，衍生自<xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase>，定義一個或多個屬於相同的應用程式屬性群組的內容。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsGroupDescriptionAttribute> is an optional attribute that you can use to provide descriptive text for a settings property group.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsGroupDescriptionAttribute> 是選擇性屬性，可讓您設定屬性群組提供描述性文字。

trans-unit.source: This text is intended to assist both design-time tools and administrative run-time tools in identifying and describing the associated property group.
trans-unit.target: 此文字被為了協助識別並描述相關聯的屬性群組中的設計階段工具和系統管理的執行階段工具。

trans-unit.source: This attribute can only be applied at the wrapper class level.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性只能套用在包裝函式類別層級。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the descriptive text for the application settings group.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含應用程式設定群組的描述文字。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsGroupDescriptionAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsGroupDescriptionAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Although the theoretical maximum length of the `description` parameter is constrained by the upper bounds of an <xref:System.Int32>, practical limits, determined by usability and quota limitations imposed by the settings provider, will be much smaller.
trans-unit.target: 雖然理論上的最大長度`description`參數受到的上限<xref:System.Int32>，實際限制，取決於可用性和設定提供者，所加諸的配額限制會小很多。

trans-unit.source: The descriptive text for the application settings properties group.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式設定屬性群組的描述文字。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the descriptive text for the application settings group.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含應用程式設定群組的描述文字。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsGroupDescriptionAttribute.Description%2A> property value is set in the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsGroupDescriptionAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
